    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Poišči delo,  opravljenjo pri kompresiji</string>
            <string language="en">Find the work done in a compression</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finden Sie die Arbeit erledigt in einer 
Komprimierung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trouvez le travail effectué dans un compactage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontre o trabalho feito em uma compressão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trovi il lavoro fatto in una compressione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βρείτε την εργασία γίνοντη σε μια συμπίεση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Encuentre el trabajo hecho en una compresión</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Masivno telo postavimo na vrh posode tako da se idealnemu plinu v posodi spremeni temperatura.</string>
            <string language="en">Massive body is placed on top of a container in such a way that temperature of a ideal gas sealed inside container increases.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">plinska enačba</string>
            <string language="en">ideal gas law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">temperatura</string>
            <string language="en">temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">delo</string>
            <string language="en">work</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Massiver Körper wird auf einen Behälter 
plaziert, so daß Temperatur eines ideales Gas inneren 
Siegelbehälters sich erhöht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le corps massif est placé sur un récipient de 
telle manière que la température d'un récipient intérieur scellé 
par gaz idéal augmente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O corpo maciço é colocado no alto de um 
recipiente de tal maneira que a temperatura gás ideal de um 
recipiente interno selado aumenta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'ente voluminoso è disposto in cima ad un 
contenitore im modo tale che la temperatura di un contenitore interno 
sigillato gas ideale aumenta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ογκώδες σώμα τοποθετείται πάνω από ένα 
εμπορευματοκιβώτιο κατά τέτοιο τρόπο ώστε η θερμοκρασία ενός 
ιδανικού σφράγισε αέριο τις εσωτερικές αυξήσεις 
εμπορευματοκιβωτίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cuerpo masivo se pone encima de un envase de 
una manera tal que la temperatura de un envase interior sellado gas 
ideal aumente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ideales Gasgesetz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Temperatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arbeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">loi idéale de gaz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la température</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">travail</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei ideal do gás</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">temperatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">trabalho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge ideale del gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θερμοκρασία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">temperatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">trabajo</string>
          </keyword>
